fullText: Annaleigh Ashford's performance as the dog Sylvia is so winning, so perfectly calibrated between human and canine, that you forget how ridiculous the premise is.
dtliExcerpt: Annaleigh Ashford's performance as the dog Sylvia is so winning, so perfectly calibrated between human and canine, that you forget how ridiculous the premise is.
